content: type of instructions - written instructions only - no charts or photo tutorials - written using american standard crochet terms - no tutorial or crochet lessons are included skill level - advanced beginner/intermediate - no tutorial or crochet lessons are included finished size - 25 20 x 28 70 inches approx multiples - multiples are included in the pattern so you can use your preferred yarn and hook to make your own size yarn & hook - stylecraft special aran - 5mm crochet hook languages - english only with no charts terms of use - for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy - all digital sales are final about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet blanket patterns this version on etsy is a neat pdf version of my free pattern
